p: Essential oil chemical compounds, 34 out of 35, obtained by GCâ€“MS, were identified ( Table 1). The major compounds were dimethyl trisulfide (15.49%), 2,8-dithianonane (52.63%) and lenthionine (14.69%). The mass spectra obtained for these major compounds are shown in Fig. 1, Fig. 2, Fig. 3, respectively.
